directions: Combine flour, salt, and baking powder. Stir in 1 1/2 cups lukewarm water.  Knead until soft but not sticky.  Shape dough into balls about 3 inches in diameter.  Flatten into patties 1/2 inch thick, and make a small hole in the center of each patty.
Fry one at a time in 1 inch of hot shortening, turning to brown on both sides.  Drain on paper towels.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)
title: Fry Bread I
